page.title: 18NATURAL HISTORY
page.content: Garstang is quite a busy town,but if you look carefully, it is amazing how many animals you can find .The most likely animals to see:hedgehogs,shrews ,moles,bats,hares,rabbits,squirrels, water and ground voles,rats and mice. The most difficult and unlikely are: stoats,weasels,mink,badgers,otters, foxes.You may not think you would find badgers,otters and foxes,but we had reports of people who have seen these animals .Animals you might find in woods in Garstang are hedgehogs, shrews,squirrels,voles,rats,mice,foxes weasel,badger,grass snakes. Animals you might find in the open fields in Garstang: rabbits, moles, shrews, voles, hedghogs, rats, mice, stoat & weasel. Animals in ponds would include newts, frogs, carp, perch, and minnows. y G.Halstead,A.Harding,K.Barlow.
